channel.title: 3D text mod preview moves items after placement
channel.description:
On the page for this 3D Text mod https://ficsit.app/mod/Cw4sNaCJ4oHqXE
Creator Andre Aquila has an animated .gif that shows a letter being moved after it's been placed.
I've searched for mods or key combinations that allow this but have not located anything. Without being able to move the letters, I don't understand how anyone could make use of the resize feature since that happens after placement.
Any idea how this preview shows items being moved after placement, or any tips? Thanks.
Is there a better forum category for a question like this?
![image|600x323](upload://pGndAiN8cwSEcrOGBoK4gn1akqj.png) https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GVgWaSKNVBs/YPsBrOQeMHI/AAAAAAAAtdc/KKvr2Es0LsEwjEIURxF_IfmpCsGzw4D8wCLcBGAsYHQ/s600/ezgif-6-8f4f9c5c7e5b.gif

item.title: 3D text mod preview moves items after placement
item.dc:creator: @Micah_Coffey Micah Coffey
item.description:
@Micah_Coffey wrote:

Thank you so much for mentioning this. This is exactly what I need.

I have a feeling I already tried this in the past but did not realize I had to first “!unlockall research” and then “!give micro manage” and equip the micro manage device before I could access its features.

Thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: 3D text mod preview moves items after placement

item.title: 3D text mod preview moves items after placement

item.description:
@JamieRCHI wrote:

Maybe the Micro Manage mod?
